page.title: 11SHOPPING IN ADDERLEY
page.content: We have three shops in our village.One shop is the Post Office.Tom Butter looks after it,he has been living in Adderley all his life.There have been Post Offices in Adderley over fifty five years,Tom's Post Office has been there five years.His customers are not all local,some cars stop as they travel through.His busiest day is Thursday when the magazines arrive. There is also a garage belonging to Chuck Jones.He has worked there for eight years ,but the garage has been there for twenty.All his customers are local.The busiest day is Saturday. Every morning newspapers are delivered from Audlem,but in the evening Suzanne Brookes delivers the Shropshire Star. Next to the Post Office there is an Antique shop,but we don't go there very often.
